title: Stepmothers and the Big Bad Wolf
description: There are countless villains found in the pages of fairy tales ogres, giants, even a witch or two but none seem to capture the imagination like the stepmothers and wolves. Here nine authors tackle these villains. In some, the wolf or stepmother becomes the hero. In others, they retain their original threatening nature. In all the stories, the villains are presented in a new light. Rediscover your favorite villains in these new fairy tales."
author: Madeline Smoot
